body_html:
cuDNN is in this Dockerfile : https://gitlab.com/nvidia/cuda/blob/ubuntu16.04/9.0/devel/cudnn7/Dockerfile

But looks like the resulting image is not available on NVidia official repo. Let me work on that and update the Dockerfile next week.

body:
cuDNN is in this Dockerfile : https://gitlab.com/nvidia/cuda/blob/ubuntu16.04/9.0/devel/cudnn7/Dockerfile

But looks like the resulting image is not available on NVidia official repo.  Let me work on that and update the Dockerfile next week.
